data.description:
Math World VR combines fun games with simple math to exercise the brain! This STEM Accredited VR game consists of 12 fun mini-games for all ages to enjoy! Who said brain exercise can't be fun?

*Axe Throwing
*Bow & Arrow
*Basketball Free Throw
*Punch The Plates
*Number Slicer
*Baseball Throw
*Target Marksman
*Carnival Darts
*Frisbee Toss
*Mini-Golf
*Multiples Paintball
*Slingshot

Each mini game in Math World VR combines simple math that adds a fun challenge. Whether it's axe throwing, even/odds with throwing darts at balloons, or shooting a bow and arrow at the correct answer for the equation, you'll have countless hours of fun - all while helping improve your math arithmetic and exercise your brain! Think you can take on harder math problems? Bump up your difficulties from easy to pro for each mini-game and see if you have what it takes!

Math World VR can be played stationary.

changelog.change_log:
- Implemented Age Classification SDK
- Fixed minor bugs
- Improved environment for performance

Patch Notes:

- Fixed a bug where the targets on 'Hard' and 'Pro' mode would lower themselves when tilting the headset down or crouching
- Spaced out the plates in Plate Smasher
- Implemented minor improvements
- Replaced photos for some mini-game covers
- Fixed sound bug on Slingshot
- Fixed a bug where targets would freeze on 'Hard' or 'Pro' when opening up the pause menu

Patch Notes:

- Fixed a bug where the targets on 'Hard' and 'Pro' mode would lower themselves when tilting the headset down or crouching
- Spaced out the plates in Plate Smasher
- Implemented minor improvements
- Replaced photos for some mini-game covers
- Fixed sound bug on Slingshot
- Fixed a bug where targets would freeze on 'Hard' or 'Pro' when opening up the pause menu

Patch Notes:

- Fixed a bug where the targets on 'Hard' and 'Pro' mode would lower themselves when tilting the headset down or crouching
- Spaced out the plates in Plate Smasher
- Implemented minor improvements

Release Notes:

1. Implemented moving targets in certain mini-games with targets for 'Hard' and 'Pro' difficulty levels
2. Adjusted text from 'multiplications' to 'multiples'
3. Improved environment for more performance
4. Adjusted multiplication symbol from '*' to 'x'

Release Notes:

- Added 4 difficulties for each mini-game:
1. Easy
2. Medium
3. Hard
4. Pro

- Improved game mechanics
- Tweaked environments for performance and new addons

1. Now supports Japanese Language.
2. Fixed small issues that caused the environment to affect performance.

Patch v3.0 Notes:

Developed a new main menu interface, allowing players to scroll and click through all of the different mini-games using the slider system or buttons.
Improved the High Score system, allowing up to 5 players to save their high score on each mini-game.
An additional 4 mini-games have been added:
a. Frisbee
b. Mini-Golf
c. Multiples Paintball
d. Slingshot
More prizes/skins have been added to the new mini-games and a few of the existing mini-games.
The environment for each mini-game has been improved for performance and aesthetics.
Fixed very minor bugs to improve player experiences

Update V2.0:

1. Added a Pause Menu feature to give the player to pause the game, mute music and audio effects, and also return to the main menu;

2. Fixed a small bug with the Quiver in the Bow & Arrow Mini-Game

3. Updated environment to improve performance

4. Fixed small bugs

MAJOR PRIZE STORE UPDATE:
a. Implemented New Prize Store System
b. Added new skins & cosmetic items to most mini games
c. Updated Menu & Store UI
d. Fixed small bugs

MAJOR OVERHAUL RELEASE:
- Optimized Game Performance
- Improved User Sound Experience
- Improved Axe Physics
- Fixed Environment Bugs
- Removed Background Flickering

Happy Holidays!
Patch v1.19: Added New Game: Plate Puncher | Tweaked Small Environment Textures | Fixed Small Art Assets

-Released New Game: Axe Throwing
-Cleaned Up Interface
Patch v0.15 -Updated user environment and surroundings -Added in audience features -Upgraded textures & materials
Patch v0.14 -Updated user environment and surroundings -Added in audience features -Upgraded textures & materials
